        Parameters:
        patterns - Array of available patterns

        Returns:

      • patternKnapsackWeightOnly

        public static PatternList patternKnapsackWeightOnly(com.sofivanhanen.yarnie.data.Pattern[] patterns,
                                                    int maxYardage)
        Knapsack alorithm for Pattern objects where value is yardage. Uses the recursive knapsack algorithm in KKKK (Kisakoodarin käsikirja)
        Parameters:
        patterns - Array of available patterns
        maxYardage - Max total yardage of result
        Returns:
        The resulting collection of patterns as PatternList

      • recursiveKnapsack

        private static PatternList recursiveKnapsack(com.sofivanhanen.yarnie.data.Pattern[] patterns,
                                             int maxIndex,
                                             int maxYards)
        Recursive method for patternKnapsack
        Parameters:
        patterns - Collection of patterns
        maxIndex - Index we're at (last index at start)
        maxYards - Amount of yards we can still use (max yards - used yards)
        Returns:
        Calculated PatternList result up to maxIndex
